transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir call kiya tha aapne Rahul baat kar raha tha India Mart se sir.
Customer: Ji ji sir are wo ek India Mart pe order aaya hua hai dekhiye mere town mein. 
Hanji. 
Customer: Wo usme wo kya kah raha hai jaise party samne 2500 ka hai 2500 ka hai.
Hanji hanji. 
Customer: To wo uske pass option ja raha hai COD ka wo payment karna chah raha hai lekin bolta hai India Mart ke madhyam se main order laga raha hu payment karne ke liye option nahi aa raha kya baat kya kya reason hai hum samajh nahi pa rahe.
Executive: Sir ye wali ki aapse baat hui hai abhi isse.
Hanji.
Executive: Ye ab aapka network problem kar raha hai. Payment karne ke liye baat kare.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Aapka dobara actually call aaya tha sir abhi dobara call kiya tha kya aapne abhi?
Customer: Nahi nahi to aapko aap hi lagaya tha manager likha tha na usme manager call to isliye usme lagaya aapko.
Executive: Accha accha. Sir mere se hi baat hui thi Vishal hai na apna account manager yaha pe Vishal ka manager hi baat kar raha hu us time bhi main hi baat kari thi actually.
Customer: Accha accha accha to main pata ki usme kya option party ko samjha hi nahi pa raha hu wo bolta hai sir aise mat karo tab tum log kya karenge.
Executive: Sir bol dijiye ki jo hai aapka.
Customer: Nahi nahi mere ko bataiye sir usko bol dijiye man lijiye chodiye koi bhi aadmi agar jaise order diya haan. 
Haan. 
Customer: Wo suppose kariye theek hai main invoice dunga ye ye katunga GST hai wo to alag baat hai jaise payment option jaise no COD aa raha hai jaise waha yaha ye bhi nahi aana chahiye tha COD bhi tab nahi aata tha to to no problem koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Payment koi option me karne ja raha hai to waha COD kyu aa raha hai fir ya to aana chahiye tha na account mein daliye ya to Google pay phone pay kuch.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Wo aana chahiye tha na.
Executive: Sir ek second hold kariega ek second hold kariye. 
Customer: Ji. Isse chote chote minimum order hai kam kam amount ka hai kal koi bada payment lagayega India Mart ke madhyam se to.
Executive: Ek second sir. 
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir maine na aapko aapke number pe abhi whatsapp kiya hai sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ek bari mujhe bhejenge wo jo screenshot aap bata rahe the COD wala jo hai.
Customer: Accha wo party bheja mere ko. 
Executive: Haan haan ek bari bhejiye main hold pe hi hu.
Customer: Main bhej raha hu aapko. Ye dekhiye order aise to manager hai aap isliye bhej de raha hu dekhiye. Ye bheja aapko.
Executive: Accha ye aapne order bana ke diya hai sir.
Customer: Haan isme order bana ke diya to isme to aana chahiye na ye. Hmm hmm.
Customer: Pay on delivery mein jaha aa raha hai COD jo aa raha hai pay on delivery pe nahi aake option aana chahiye tha na phone pe ya google pay account pe.
Executive: Sir wo gateway nahi hai na isliye wo option nahi aa raha hoga kyuki gateway ke through payment hogi na wo wali fir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To isiliye kyuki account detail kya hai ki aapka jaise man lijiye aapki company jo registered India Mart pe aapka jo primary number hai man lijiye aap kal ko koi staff rakhte hai to account detail wagera wo sare change kar sakte hai apne end se.
Customer: Ji. Matlab man lijiye.
Executive: Ki aapka jo number hai primary wala uske through aap koi bhi account number apna dal sakte ho change kar sakte ho to isiliye wala option jo hai sir payment gateway hai hi nahi India Mart ka to online wala band kar rakha hai humne isi chakkar mein.
Customer: Accha. To order agar aap India Mart ke through waha se specifically order bana ke doge na to waha se ye wala option aa jata hai pay on delivery wala to main recommend karunga aap apna jo quotation hai na aap quotation mail mail se send kar dijiye apne personal mail se.
Customer: Accha mere ko thoda saal bataiye kaise kare abhi kaise jaye main.
Executive: Sir mail pe mail pe ja ke bana ke aap bhej dijiye sakta hai na jaise ki unka jo order hai kisi bhi product ka wo apna mail se type kar ke bhej dijiye ki ye order hai ye India Mart ka mera catalog ye catalog ka link bhej dijiye main aapko catalog ka link shayad bhej deta hu ki India Mart pe registered catalog hai mera aur ispe mere account details account details maine likh ke mention kar dijiye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Jaise ki aapka ye catalog link hai India Mart ka. 
Han. 
Executive: Maine aapko whatsapp kiya hai ye link waha pe dikha dijiye trust factor ke basis pe ki India Mart ke aap registered employee hai trust seal customer hai aur agar aap chahte hai to aap ye bhi bhej sakte hai mail pe likh ke unko ya whatsapp kar sakte hai ek second rukiega.
Executive: Ek maine aapko India Mart ka aapka trust seal certificate bhej diya hai sir.
Customer: Wahi cheez main samjha raha hu usko dekhta hu dekhta hu. 
Executive: Haan unhe unhe zyada wo hai to unhe jo hai ye expiry date jo hai expiry date dikha dijiyega ki 24 June 2026 tak mera catalog to waise hi chal raha hai India Mart ke sath. Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai sir isme GST. Haan baat kariye sir aur sir ek kaam kariye ab mera ye number hai na jo maine whatsapp wala kiya hai. 
Han han. 
Executive: Ispe directly call kar lijiyega ye mera jo hai personal number hi hai theek hai koi bhi issue aata hai bahut bahut manager isliye number dekhiye India Mart ke madhyam se likha is par Rahul aapka naam aa raha hai na. 
Han han. 
Customer: Isme kya main India Mart likhta hu to bahut India Mart DM likhta hu mane manager to usse kya hota hai ki bahut change ho jata hai isliye kitna save karu Rahul India Mart. 
Executive: Ji ji ji ji ji. Main mere ko pata nahi chalta fir baad mein aayenge phone koi aata hai isliye bol raha hu. 
Han han han. 
Executive: Sir isse isse karwa lijiye is number se mere ko kar lijiyega theek hai aur aapka yaha pe wo concern khul gaya tha iske regarding wo concern ko main close kar de raha hu kyuki bar bar yaha se calls walls jayenge aapko fir faltu mein to directly aap mere ko whatsapp pe hi connect kar lijiyega whatsapp is number pe call kar lijiyega directly wala theek hai sir. 
Customer: Chaliye main save kar liya isko haan. 
Executive: Haan haan haan haan theek hai sir. Hmm hmm hmm. Okay sir okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's client unable to pay via COD.

- Payment options not showing correctly.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the payment gateway process.

- Executive shared catalog and TrustSeal certificate.

- Executive shared personal number for direct contact.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact executive if needed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, cod, trustseal, catalog, order
